channel.title: Project Honesty... Website & Server
channel.description:
[center][b][size=18pt]Project Honesty[/size][/b][/center]
[b]Information[/b] The server will be a 317 Server with all the features RuneScape had in 2007. I hope to re-make the RuneScape of 2007 and the 2007 website. I have got the Website homepage coded in HTML & CSS, However i am hoping to turn it into a PHP CMS System.
[b]Positions Needed[/b]
[ul][li]2 Server Coders[/li] [li]2 Client Coders[/li] [li]1 HTML & CSS Coder[/li] [li]PHP Coder[/li][/ul]
[b]Current Team[/b]
[ul][li]WowILikeToCode - HTML & CSS Coder[/li] [li]WowILikeToCode - Server Coder[/li][/ul]
[b]What will make this server unique[/b] This server will have full PvP System with perfect PvM. All skills will be trainable in the correct RuneScape way. We will have an amazing rule enforcement system with automated black marks and a chat filter. We hope to have no commands so we can maintain a healthy economy driven server with many active players.
[b]Application form[/b] a * marks a required field. Name*: Age: Position Applied For*: Experience in this Position*: Why you think you should be given this position*: e-mail address*: Skype name: Msn:

item.title: Project Honesty... Website & Server
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Phaze One:

The 344,234,984,344th person who has attempted to ‘re-make’ Runescape. I wish you luck however.

Made me Lol. But yea you are right…

Phrosteh:

Damn I miss those days =).

Same thats why im doing this

Read full topic

item.title: Project Honesty... Website & Server
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Project Honesty[/size][/center]

Information
The server will be a 317 Server with all the features RuneScape had in 2007. I hope to re-make the RuneScape of 2007 and the 2007 website. I have got the Website homepage coded in HTML & CSS, However i am hoping to turn it into a PHP CMS System.

Positions Needed

[ul][li]2 Server Coders[/li]
[li]2 Client Coders[/li]
[li]1 HTML & CSS Coder[/li]
[li]PHP Coder[/li][/ul]

Current Team

[ul][li]WowILikeToCode - HTML & CSS Coder[/li]
[li]WowILikeToCode - Server Coder[/li][/ul]

What will make this server unique
This server will have full PvP System with perfect PvM. All skills will be trainable in the correct RuneScape way. We will have an amazing rule enforcement system with automated black marks and a chat filter. We hope to have no commands so we can maintain a healthy economy driven server with many active players.
